description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: In pt_sysctl_command of pt.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

En pt_sysctl_command de pt.c, hay una posible escritura fuera de los límites debido a una verificación de los límites incorrecta. Esto podría llevar a una escalada local de privilegios con permisos de ejecución de System necesarios. La interacción del usuario no es necesaria para la explotación.
